description: Formal language theory, principles, and techniques of compiler construction, programming language design concepts, parallelism, and formal semantics. 3 hrs (class). Prerequisite: CMSC 124 and CMSC 141 or COI. Offered during Second Semester.
Recent developments in computer architecture and computer systems. 3 hrs (class). Prerequisite: CMSC 125 and CMSC 131 or COI. Offered during First Semester.

Conceptual design of a database; models for conceptual design; database management, security and recovery; database languages. 3 hrs (class). Prerequisite: CMSC 127 or COI. Offered during First Semester.

column5: Finite automata and regular expressions; context-free languages; Turing machines; undecidability. 3 hrs (class). Prerequisite: CMSC 141 or COI. Offered during First Semester.

course_name: Algorithms and Advanced Data Structures I
description: Design, analysis, and implementation of algorithms; use of advanced data structures in algorithm design. 3 hrs (class). Prerequisite: CMSC 142 or COI. Offered during First Semester.

course_name: Algorithms and Advanced Data Structures II
description: Advanced topics in algorithmic graph theory, efficient polynomial and matrix algorithms; number theoretic algorithms, string processing and computational geometry; design and analysis of parallel algorithms; theory of NP-completeness and approximation algorithms. 3 hrs (class). Prerequisite: CMSC 244. Offered during Second Semester.
Principles, methodology, and tools of scientific computing. 3 hrs (class). Prerequisite: MATH 28 or MATH 38 or COI. Offered during First Semester.
Theories, applications, recent advances, and open problems in digital image processing. 5 hrs (2 class, 3 lab). Prerequisite: CMSC 165 or COI. Offered during Second Semester.
Computer-based methodologies for the design and development of management information systems. 3 hrs (class). Prerequisite: CMSC 127 or COI. Offered during First Semester.
Information engineering concepts and tools for strategic systems planning and development. 3 hrs (class). Prerequisite: CMSC 127 or COI. Offered during Second Semester.
Parallel machine models; design, analysis, and implementation of parallel algorithms. 3 hrs (class). Prerequisite: CMSC 132 or COI. Offered during Second Semester.
May be taken twice provided that the total number of units to be credited to the student’s program will not exceed 4 units. Prerequisite: COI. Offered during First Semester and Second Semester.

May be taken twice. Offered during First and Second Semester.
Supervised individual research work culminating in a written thesis and oral defense. Prerequisite: COI. Offered during First Semester, Second Semester, and Midyear.
